name: Cheddar, Broccoli and Ham Stuffed Potatoes
ingredients: 10 oz broccoli, coarsely chopped (thawed if frozen)
instructions: Cut a 2-3” wide strip from top of each baked potato.
Scoop out pulp, leaving shells intact.
Place pulp in a large mixing bowl, set pulp and shells aside.
Melt 1 Tbsp butter in a small skillet over medium high heat; add red pepper and green onions, and sauté 3-4 minutes or until veggies are tender.
Stir together pulp, 1 Tbsp butter, green onion mix, ham and sour cream, salt and pepper.
Spoon mix into shells and place on baking sheet.
Sprinkle with cheese, and bake 10 more minutes.
